fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

Interface ApplicationDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Attributable, Device, Identifiable

    public interface ApplicationDevice
extends Device
    Represents a device which is visible (can be used) by an application.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager.Device

        LIFECYCLE_METADATA

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Application getApplication()
      Returns the application which uses this device.
      Application getAppOwner()
      Returns the application which has exported this device if it exists.
      AvailableDevice getAvailableDevice()
      Returns the available device if it exists.
      List<Object> getDeviceProxies()
      Returns the device proxies which can be used by the related application.
      Object getDeviceProxy(Class... interfaces)
      Returns the device proxy which can be used by the related application.
      KnownDevice getKnownDevice()
      Returns the corresponding known device.
      ApplicationDevice getProtectedDevice()
      Returns a device proxy which does not allow to navigate in internal structure of device manager.
      boolean isProtected()
      Returns true if this device is protected.

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager.Device

        getDetailedFaults, getGlobalFault, getName, getService, getServices, getTypeId, getVendor, hasExclusiveAccess, hasFault, hasServiceType, isAvailable

        getId

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableDevice

        AvailableDevice getAvailableDevice()
        Returns the available device if it exists. Else returns null.
        Returns:
        the available device if it exists.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this device is protected.

      • getKnownDevice

        KnownDevice getKnownDevice()
        Returns the corresponding known device.
        Returns:
        the known device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this device is protected.

      • getApplication

        Application getApplication()
        Returns the application which uses this device. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the application which uses this device.

      • getAppOwner

        Application getAppOwner()
        Returns the application which has exported this device if it exists. Else returns null.
        Returns:
        the application which has exported this device if it exists.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this device is protected.

      • getDeviceProxy

        Object getDeviceProxy(Class... interfaces)
        Returns the device proxy which can be used by the related application. Returns null if there is no such a proxy.
        Parameters:
        interfaces - interfaces which are implemented by the proxy.
        Returns:
        the device proxy which can be used by the related application.

      • getDeviceProxies

        List<Object> getDeviceProxies()
        Returns the device proxies which can be used by the related application. Returns an empty list if there is no proxy.
        Returns:
        the device proxies which can be used by the related application.

      • getProtectedDevice

        ApplicationDevice getProtectedDevice()
        Returns a device proxy which does not allow to navigate in internal structure of device manager.
        Returns:
        a device proxy which does not allow to navigate in internal structure of device manager.

      • isProtected

        boolean isProtected()
        Returns true if this device is protected. In this case, you cannot access to internal device representation (KnownDevice, other Application...).
        Returns:
        true if this device is protected.
